feed.title: Samad's Atom Feed!
feed.subtitle: Just some articles Samad finds interesting, and he hopes you do too!

entry.title: Who needs Facebook friends when there's Kirobo? - CNET
entry.summary: Facebook continues its quest to become a community classifieds section with the mobile Marketplace. But nothing you'll find for sale will ever be as cool as Toyota's Kirobo Mini.

entry.title: NASA Awards Contract for Information Technology Support Services
entry.summary: NASA has awarded its Goddard Information Technology Integration Support Services (GITISS) contract to Business Integra, Inc. of Bethesda, Maryland.

entry.title: NASA, China to Collaborate on Air Traffic Management Research
entry.summary: NASA and the Chinese Aeronautical Establishment (CAE) have signed a memorandum of understanding to cooperate on aeronautics research that will advance air transportation automation for U.S. and Chinese aviation operations in China.

entry.title: Primatologist Frans de Waal weighs in on Harambe
entry.summary: Where does our sense of right and wrong come from?

entry.title: Everything Dies, Right? But Does Everything Have To Die? Here's A Surprise
entry.summary:
A puzzlement.

Why, I wonder, are both these things true?
